data.message: Hi Facebook,   I recently have been blocked from messaging people who have commented on my real estate for sale posts to see if they need services in which I offer.  I also have an ad running asking if then need real estate services and can no longer message them as well.  If you could help me and clarify how I prevent this from happening again and allow me to continue reaching out to users.

replies.message: Hi Michael. You can learn more about why you may have been blocked from sending messages in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2uICWO8. Thanks! -Caitlin
